name: Verify claim information section reset on Renewal transaction

testSteps.description: And underwriter is on home page
When underwriter selects Renew transaction on policy
Then Expiring Term Claim Count, 2 Year Claim Count, 3 Year Claim Count should be reset or blank on renewal in claim information screen

userStory.storyName: Renewal term should be displayed as Issued status until prior term expiresﾠ(PI-2314)
